rules_text: When Feisty Scrapper enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The gears of crashed crafts are traded all over the frontier, a highly prized asset for artificers, pilots, and gunsmiths alike.[/i]
